pause_post.description: Enable/disable pause_post functionality. Set to true to enable pause_post calls, false to disable them. Default: false (disabled)

idle_table_api.description: Broadcast interval for idle_table_api mode. System will continuously send broadcast post at this interval when in idle_table_api mode.

idle_sensor_stuck.description: Broadcast interval for idle_sensor_stuck mode. System will continuously send broadcast post at this interval when in idle_sensor_stuck mode.

description: Unified configuration for table API actions including pause_post and broadcast settings.
